程序包 com.academic_assistant.controller

类 UserController

java.lang.Object
com.academic_assistant.controller.UserController
@RestController public class UserController extends Object
UserController handles the HTTP requests related to user operations, including login, follow/unfollow, and course management.

作者: KyrieLei524

      userRepository - the repository that handles user data

      Logs in a user.
      参数:
      loginRequest - the request containing the login details
      返回:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation

      Handles GitHub login logic.
      参数:
      code - the authorization code from GitHub
      返回:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the GitHub login operation
